marklogic.body:
It's not really that big a problem the only reason its getting this much attention is because its made by apple. My Samsung GS2 gets noticeably hot after playing a game like PES 2012 for a long time, and I have never owned a laptop that doesn't eventually Heat up my gentleman's area after a while. Also games consoles like my PS3 starts to Heat up after an hour and my fan starts to go crazy.
Playing a game like Infinity Blade on an IPad for an hour is a very long time expect it to go hot and rather than complaining just put it down and rest for a while then resume playing, its no big problem
